name: Hotel Eden Roc

reviews.text: I can't praise Eden Roc enough. What a wonderful location, clean rooms and amazing views. We were very well looked after and bookings of restaurants and boats easily done from reception. They even posted to the UK my t-shirt which I forgot in the room!
reviews.title: Awesome Stay
The Eden Roc Hotel truly is a little piece of 'Paradise'.
reviews.text: Having a drink in the bar before heading out is a must - great Prosseco in chilled glasses and a very pleasant barman who is clearly very proud of Italy and all it has to offer.

reviews.title: Loved The Eden Rock Hotel
reviews.text: The Eden Roc Hotel truly is a little piece of "Paradise". Look no further book your room now. We stayed at the Eden Roc the first week in May. We could not have had a more pleasant experience at this delightful charming hotel. The owner Domenico and his two sons Raffaele and Lorenzo could not have been more helpful and gracious. They made suggestions about our daily itinerary and helped with transportation and restaurant reservations. Cafe Positano was wonderful! The hotel staff was extremely efficient. We enjoyed the breakfast buffet and being greeted by a warm and friendly reception each morning. Carlo was particularly helpful and knowledgeable about Italian wines and added to our memories at the Eden Roc. Our junior suite was very spacious and well designed. We had a large balcony with a "breathtaking view". The hotel was spotless. Not only was it charming but it was very clean and well maintained. It truly lives up to its rating and more! We would like to thank the Cassola family and staff at Eden Roc for making our stay in beautiful Positano and the Amalfi Coast one we will never forget. We look forward to returning to Eden Roc for another fantasic stay and magical visit.

reviews.title: Luxury Hotel with a Personal, Family Touch
reviews.text: I can highly recommend the charming Eden Rock Hotel in Positano. Lorenzo and all his staff were wonderful and made our stay very memorable.

reviews.title: Raves for the Eden Roc
reviews.text: The junior suite we booked for 7 nights was beautiful and overlooked the sea, it had a roomy balcony and a gorgeous view of Positano. The hotel was delightful and spotlessly clean. The Adam and Eve restaurant served delicious local dishes and divine wine and is set in lovely surroundings. This hotel is in a fabulous location and a very pleasant 10 minute walk to the local shops and restaurants.
Eden Roc is great and mostly because of their fantastic staff.
reviews.title: Great staff

reviews.text: Carla was fantastic in the bar and also gave excellent recommendations from restaurants to trips. We booked all our trips through them and they worked out great.
reviews.title: Eden Roc nice hotel but pool small
Perfection in Positano
reviews.text: The position of the hotel is lovely and very near everything. Bedrooms very big and very clean.
Lunchtime food was great but agree breakfast could do with less sweet stuff on the menu. Again service is fantastic from breakfast right through to dinner.
reviews.title: Simply Fabulous!

reviews.text: The only thing I would improve in Eden Roc is the upstairs restaurant eating area, it would be nicer with better tables and to be freshened up a bit as it has great potential. It would also be great to have evening drinks upstairs as they have fanstastic views rather than down in the bar.
reviews.title: Modern comforts, old world charm

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My Husband and I stayed at the Eden Roc when Italy won the world cup the whole town went nuts, the owners of the hotel gave us champagne, and the hotel owners asked us to ride with them up top of positano and back down we said yes it was so fun partying with Italy. We loved our room we had and excellent view of the water and beach, we went down every day to the beach and shop also did some tours that the owners set up for us to Capri and Pompei Revello and Amalfi. Food was excellent for dinner the Gnooci was awsome. Loved brekfast every morning loved the staff at breakfast miss them very much!!! we will definatley be back to Eden Roc!!!
reviews.title: beautiful people beautiful views!!!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The word WOW! Does not due justice to the Eden Roc hotel. The entrance, the staff, the room, the rooftop deck, the food... nothing could have been better. Although, I was craving a margarita, that is the ONLY thing I do NOT recommend getting in Italy, rather, order drinks like lemoncellos or something that similar to that of an Italian specialty.
reviews.title: Better than WOW!!

likes.liked: — The fact that the hotel staff (lorenzo) created a heart on our bed with rose petals and then sent our frozen 1yr old wedding cake to donna rosa for us in a cab, so that I could surprise my husband.

reviews.title: wonderful family run 4 star hotel
reviews.text: We went for our 1st wedding anniversary and the entire trip was fantastic. We brought along the michellian guide and another less in depth guide and were thrilled. Ask the locals as well as the staff for great spots for lunch, dinner, drinks... and you will be even more amazed. although the food at the eden roc was amazing, we loved to venture out. enjoy, enjoy, enjoy. By the way, go to the ceramic factory for ALL of your ceramic goodies. They are reasonable, creative and very helpful, not too mention a fraction of the price from every other store in town. You need to take a taxi there, it is a 5 min. drive from eden roc. there is also a small restaurant in ravella, I can't recall the name, but the meal that we had there, was outstanding!! the owner's name is Neddie and she is an absolute delight. you also must go to donna rosa!! have fun!!

you will not find a better 4 star hotel in positano than this family run eden roc hotel. the staff couldn't be more friendly and helpful. the rooms are a nice size, ours with a huge terrace. views are exceptional. a short walk downhill into town, but walking back uphill can be a little strenuous so take the bus for 1 euro from town and it drops you off exactly in front of the hotel. from the harbour you can take several boats to capri for the day, as well as the town of amalfi. from amalfi, take the local bus up to the town of revello. if you want to go to sorrento, i would suggest you take the bus (1.4 euros)instead of the boat which you pick up just outside the hotel. it will drop you at the main area of town unlike the boat. try not to miss pompeii. it is certainly worth seeing and expect to spend about 2 hours. guides are about 80 euros but if you tell them you want to go with a small group of english speaking people, they will usually be able to organize something and it will only cost you 10 euros each and much better than the audio casette for 7 euros.
reviews.title: Great Hotel, Great Staff, Great Views
Terrific Eden Roc
reviews.text: the eden roc is one of those rare finds....a quaint hotel with excellent service.

reviews.title: Wonderfully friendly hotel with a great atmosphere.
reviews.text: We spent part of our 25th Anniversary trip here in August 2006. The staf were friendly and helpful, particularly Rafaele who answered our many emails with patience and humour.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Our room was the Imperial suite which had its own hot tub on the balcony, sheer luxury to sink into after a hard day sightseeing, glass of wine/champagne in hand. The rest of the suite was also fabulous.
reviews.title: What a Place -WOW!

reviews.text: One small criticism is that they did not acknowledge our Anniversary (this has been mentioned before by another poster) a card/bottle of wine would have really addded to a memorable occasion) By contrast another hotel close by went out of their way to do something special for us and produced a cake and had us serenaded by musicians at dinner. This was so special for us and made our day.
reviews.title: Like staying with family

reviews.text: Overall though we had a wonderful stay at the Eden Roc and would not hesitate to return.
reviews.title: Fantastic Stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: What this place lacks is a stairway to heaven!
reviews.title: Loved!! Excellent Hotel!!

description: Stylish 4 star hotel Eden Roc in Positano, welcomes you to its cozy establishment.The hotel which overlooks the blue sea, is situated a few metres from the beaches and the centre of Positano, in an ideal position to spend a day of culture and relax in the heart of the Amalfi Coast.The 25 intimate and peaceful rooms and suites, furnished with antique furniture and equipped with the most disparate comforts, are bright and elegant, with a unified feature: a view of the sea that from the city of Positano expands to the Le Galli Islands, Punta Licosa and Praiano, giving you a glimpse of a unique sky that will remain ingrained in the memory of our guests.
